question: Which of the following happens because of DBT(Direct benefit transfer)?
option1: Benefits are directly given to beneficiary in hand
option2: Money is directly given in hand to beneficiary
option3: Money is directly transferred to beneficiaries bank account
option4: Money is given by the government official directly
answer: Money is directly transferred to beneficiaries bank account
explanation: DBT is the direct benefit transfer where the money is directly transferred to the account of beneficiary avoiding middlemen which reduces corruption in the system.
